channel.title: Putting server up
channel.description:
hey guys i need help i keep trying to upload my .jar file with a custom html on my website and it goes all good until i allow the java then i get this picture? [img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/2060m7q.jpg[/img] heres the html [code] SERVER NAME HERE Java is not installed on your machine or your browser does not allowed Java Applet to run

Get the latest Java technology at http://www.java.com/ [/code] anybody please help

item.title: Putting server up
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

what revision is this ?? because if this is a 317 . it means u didnt manifest it properly , and if its a 600+ means u need to manifest (loader) instead of (client)

Read full topic

item.title: Putting server up
item.dc:creator: @soapeater3 soapeater3
item.description:
@soapeater3 wrote:

if its a 718 like the url says it should be “Loader.class”

Read full topic
